# Stewart Lithgo

Stewart Lithgo (born 2 June 1957) is an English former professional boxer who competed from 1979 to 1987. He won the British Boxing Board of Control (BBBofC) Northern (England) Area heavyweight title, and inaugural Commonwealth cruiserweight title, and was a challenger for the BBBofC Northern (England) Area heavyweight title against Paul Lister[http://boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=22579&cat=boxer], and BBBofC British cruiserweight title against Sammy Reeson[http://boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=22812&cat=boxer], his professional fighting weight varied from , i.e. cruiserweight to , i.e. heavyweight.
